DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate whether case management social worker nurse decrease number emergency room visit , increase number primary care doctor visit , increase quality life people Medicaid manage care plan .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Case Management Medicaid Managed Care Plan
DOC.detailed_description: This study assign participant base Zip Code one two condition : control experimental . In control group , participant receive telephonic assessment baseline , three month , six month . These assessment conduct member Medical Center ’ Department Geriatrics supervision Principal Investigator . Participants experimental group receive medical case management provide nurse social worker homecare set include in-home assessment . Assessments conduct baseline , three month , six month routine homecare visit . Dependent variable measure include : access primary care physician , emergent hospitalizations/admissions , articulation advance directive , quality life . Data collect participant ’ medical claim record analyze number emergent hospitalizations/admissions , documentation advance directive , number visit primary care physician . To measure participant ’ quality life , Depression Self-Rating Scale Clinical Anxiety Scale utilized . Data compare within group via statistical analysis . The researcher conduct pre-post comparison utilization database-derived outcome group , compare 12 month prior 20 month follow enrollment .
DOC.criteria: participation Medicaid manage care plan resident identify zip code Brooklyn , NY frequent hospitalization low frequency primary doctor visit resident outside catchment area patient manage Medicaid manage care plan
